attributes.additional_details:
Legislate to make it a condition of office that every M.P. must work one shift a week, every week, as a hospital porter to keep them in touch with those that vote and remind voters that politicians might be human, after all who doesn’t have connections with our National Health Service through our own and our family and friends experience as patients and or staff.
All MPs claim their motivation is to "serve" this would prove it.
If you would like to reconnect elected and electors please support this petition

Sir Jimmy Savile did this work many believed that it demonstrated his humanity and kept his feet firmly on the ground and loved him for it.
